alfredsnippet.snippet:
# we want to install new moduel "pivottablejs" to dataSc environment


# make sure python3 is activated
echo 'export PATH="/Users/poudel/miniconda3/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bash_profile

source ~/.bash_profile


# activate dataSc environment    
source activate dataSc


# install the package
pip install --user pivottablejs
alfredsnippet.name: conda new module
